alert.note: Alert for Copiah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:41AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lincoln and southwestern Copiah Counties through 815 AM CST... At 741 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Caseyville, or 15 miles west of Brookhaven, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Loyd Star around 750 AM CST. Brookhaven around 800 AM CST. Wesson around 805 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Beauregard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
